title: Chest Commands菜单问题
author: a1457370814
txt_content:
明明添加着ID却显示0下面是配置文件和截图。
menu-settings:
  name: "指令菜单"
  rows: 6
  command: "/sssss"
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true

菜单1:
  NAME: "&6新手村"
  COMMAND: "spawn"
  ID: 57
  LORE:
    - "左键一下即可"
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
菜单2:
  NAME: "&d回家"
  COMMAND: "home"
  ID: 324
  LORE:
    - "&c请先设置家"
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2
菜单3:
  NAME: "&4设置家"
  COMMAND: "sethome"
  ID: 324
  LORE:
    - ""
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 2
菜单4:
  NAME: "回地皮"
  COMMAND: "plotme home"
  ID: 2
  LORE:
    - "请先领取地皮！"
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2
菜单5:
  NAME: "&d领取地皮"
  COMMAND: "plotme auto"
  ID: 2
  LORE:
    - "&2不要钱！"
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 2
菜单6:
  NAME: "&1接受传送"
  COMMAND: "tpaccept"
  ID: 368
  LORE:
    - ""
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 6
菜单7:
  NAME: "&3随机传送"
  COMMAND: "tpr"
  ID: 76
  LORE:
    - ""
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 6
菜单8:
  NAME: "&c&n自杀"
  COMMAND: "suicide"
  ID: 51
  LORE:
    - ""
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 8
  POSITION-Y: 1
菜单9:
  NAME: "&5赞助找45678"
  COMMAND: ""
  ID: 323
  LORE:
    - "&6玩的开心~时空小镇"
  KEEP-OPEN: 
  PRICE:
  PERMISSON:
  POSITION-X: 8
  POSITION-Y: 3
list:
    NAME: '&a查看人数' 
    COMMAND: 'list ' 
    ID: 397
    LORE: 
       - '查看人数.'
    POSITION-X: 7
    POSITION-Y: 2
pvp:
    NAME: '&a切换pvp' 
    COMMAND: 'pvp ' 
    ID: 276
    LORE: 
       - '开启或关闭PVP.'
    POSITION-X: 8 
    POSITION-Y: 5
near:
    NAME: '&a查看你附近的玩家' 
    COMMAND: 'op:near ' 
    ID: 381
    LORE: 
       - '使用鹰眼.'
    POSITION-X: 7 
    POSITION-Y: 5

replies.author: xiangnian
replies.txt_content:
xiangnian 发表于 2015-7-30 14:09
显示什么？
你的是1.7.2版本的插件吗？如果是的话，你试试吧ID改为：ITEM
111:
  NAME: '1'
  ID: 1
  COMMAND: '1'
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
你按照这个格式来填写试试可不可以

replies.author: a1457370814
replies.txt_content:
xiangnian 发表于 2015-7-30 13:44
这些的：“菜单1”“菜单2”这些东西改掉，改成字母或者数字，然后再试试可不可以 ...
还是不能QAQ。
